lines: Received \J[getItemName(itemId)].
It's empty.
Hi!
My name is Oda!
What's your name?
It's nice to meet you...
I was looking for my sister... I think she may have wandered off.
I'm not too worried...she's pretty shy, though.
Say... Can you help me look for her? I'll stay here in case she comes back.
Don't worry about changing your plans or anything... Just tell my sister she was being missed if you see her.
Her name is Hirta!
Thank you so much!
Good luck with wherever you're going. You seem very...focused.
Hi again!

question: Anything you wanted to say?
choices: What do you like to do?

lines: I'm Oda, the dragonfly!
...You can't see my wings right now...
...For I am well dressed.
Oh. You don't know where this place is?
This is the Heritage Park, I think.
It's supposed to celebrate the past of our world...
Yet, we really don't know much about the past.
I guess we sometimes don't anything about what's around us...
Oh! My sister, Hirta?
She's really nice! She's kinda quiet, though.
If you ever meet her, she might not say much of anything.
She's also really smart, too!
I think she'll be alright on her own...
I like to have lots of fun! I like to spend time with friends, too...
It's nice that I'm getting to know you better, too.
It looks like nothing could possibly wake him up...
He also is kind of REALLY in the way of the door...
He'll probably be like this for a while.
Oh, he's still out cold.
WAKE UP, MAN!
Wha-?
Hey! Why'd you wake me up?!
We have to see MVP!
YOU ALWAYS DO THIS!
BECAUSE YOU ALWAYS MESS UP!
BECAUSE YOU'RE ALWAYS SO DRAMATIC!
YOU'RE JUST AN IDIOT!
I'LL GET THE OTHERS TO BEAT YOU UP, I SWEAR!
OH YEAH?! I CAN TAKE THEM ALL!
(The two stormed off together...)
(Noise and Sleep don't seem to get along together very well...)
Wow, you actually came here.
You really are something...
You just don't know when to quit.
That's pretty funny...
Hey, actually... I have a question.
Oh.
Whatever. I think you know too much about the way things work around here...
You're just some machine...
You can't be trusted.
It looks like you made a big mistake.
Come on! Why didn't you fight back?
Do you think you're above it all?
Too good to fight me, right?
Well, I won't let you off easy next time.
Don't think you can talk to my buddies, either. They sure don't want to talk to you.
I'll bet... No one ever talks to someone like you first.
You always find someone else. You always make the first move. No one else will...
Sad.
So, the part of the world unleashing the darkness wasn't always a bad place to be?
It was protected by these...guardians with their knowledge?
...Until the time came when they disappeared?
Now the only souls here are these fools who treat everything like a joke.
The prank earlier managed to make things even worse!
Now, their apathy will ruin our one chance to stop the darkness.
Watch out for MVP! He's really bad!
Seriously! Don't trust him!
...I'm gonna drag the rest of the group down, now.
Both of my hands are busted...
There's no point in not telling you what we do anymore.
My buds and I...Strike, Sleep, Noise, Party, and MVP...
I guess we just kind of wander around this city and do whatever we want.
It's...pretty great. We don't let anyone else push us around or tell us what to do.
Nothing wrong with being happy, right?
...Sometimes we had it pretty rough.
Whatever...
I kind of want to keep an eye out for you now, OK?
I mean... I don't want anything bad to happen to you.
Just don't tell MVP.
Then he'd break my face, too.
I'm so glad we found Hirta!
I suppose she never was in trouble, in the first place...
Say! It would be great if you visited our house!
Come on! Let's go!
I'm the spirit who protects these woods, as you CLEARLY didn't know yet.
That's fine, though. What I truly hate is those idiots who destroy this wonderful place.
They're all alike...
Hey... You've been talking about me behind my back to everyone else, huh?
You know what?
This is OK!
Why?
Those jerks just littered for the last time!
Since, like, we're gonna throw them out of this park for good... Right?
I can't believe this!
The things MVP and those other idiots do!
I'm a little scared right now...
I think everything will be fine in the end, though.
We'll always be there for each other...
Hi! Thanks for dropping by.
I guess you're in a hurry,so I won't bore you with chatter.
So, where do you need to get to?
I know we'll always be friends!
Let's go help the others!
I'm so glad you came! There's not really much time to spare...
